artist: Attributed to Francesco Fontebasso; Formerly attributed to Luigi Sabatelli; Attributed to John Hamilton Mortimer A.R.A; May be Guiseppi Sabatelli; May be Francesco Sabatelli; May be Giuseppe Piattoli
inscription:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: [Luigi Savatelli? / Lorenzo Bartolini?]
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on blue paper
provenance: ?Sale, Sotheby's, London, May 29, 1975, part of no. 206, for £110 to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1975-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Roman Soldier and Woman Fleeing Man Armed with a Shovel
